subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Washington Nationals, with the third-lowest payroll in the major leagues, have started the season 2-8. But with a new stadium on the way, there are signs of hope for the future.
snippet: The Washington Nationals, with the third-lowest payroll in the major leagues, have started the season 2-8. But with a new stadium on the way, there are signs of hope for the future.
